item.title: Jframe
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

How do i add or delte frame buttons.

here is the gui
-----import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import javax.swing.;
import javax.swing.event.;
import java.net.URL.;
import java.net.;

public class GUI extends JPanel implements ActionListener
{
private JButton forumButton;
private JButton newsAndAnnouncementsButton;
private JLabel versionNumber;

public GUI()
{
	forumButton = new JButton("Mopar");
	newsAndAnnouncementsButton = new JButton("Vote");
	versionNumber = new JLabel("Version #" + client.clientVersion);

	//add components
	add(forumButton);
	add(newsAndAnnouncementsButton);

	forumButton.addActionListener(this);
	forumButton.setActionCommand("forums");
	newsAndAnnouncementsButton.addActionListener(this);
	newsAndAnnouncementsButton.setActionCommand("news");

	//set component bounds (only needed by Absolute Positioning)
	//serverName.setBounds (5, 0, 137, 25);
	//knowledgeBaseButton.setBounds (5, 30, 137, 25);
	//forumsButton.setBounds (5, 60, 137, 25);
	//itemsButton.setBounds (5, 90, 137, 25);
	//versionNumber.setBounds (5, 120, 137, 25);
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
{
	try
	{
		if ("kBase".equals(e.getActionCommand()))
		{
			URI url = new URI("http://google.com");
			Desktop.getDesktop().browse(url);
		}
		else if ("forums".equals(e.getActionCommand()))
		{
			URI url = new URI("http://moparisthebest.com");
			Desktop.getDesktop().browse(url);
		}
		else if ("news".equals(e.getActionCommand()))
		{
			URI url = new URI("http://Chosenpkz.tk");
			Desktop.getDesktop().browse(url);
		}
	}
	catch(Exception err)
	{
		err.printStackTrace();
	}
}

}
